entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
